onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} plunged into the heart of the burning village, smoke stinging his eyes and flames devouring the rooftops. Screams pierced the air as he raced from one terrified villager to another, pulling them from danger and guiding them to safety. Every ounce of his strength and skill was pushed to the limit.

Above the chaos, the Angel slipped away, unseen and unchallenged. When the last of the flames finally died down, the villagers gathered amidst the ruins, their eyes filled with awe and gratitude. They hailed {Player} as their savior, though the scars of that night would linger in both the village and his own heart.
